name: Skies and The Lands Below
description:
A long time ago, there was a massive shift on Earth. Suddenly, masses of land started to form in the sky and millions of people flocked to the skies above to start a new life of luxury and peace. However, the people who remained below were completely forgotten and eventually, the sky gardens completely covered the light from above, plunging their lives into darkness.

Yeah, so I still don't know how to make music work when I upload a project, so I've given up on it. Originally, I had made this game for a classmate working on the same project, BUT they didn't like it (bruh) so I just added some changes and here it is. It's kinda obvious that I put more effort into the first part of the game because I wanted to be impressive, but oh well.
